Beginning Russian I.Description: Aural comprehension, oral drill and discussion of grammar principles, written exercises, and reading assignments.

TechnicalAndDigitalSkills: Proficiency in Russian grammar and vocabulary
Listening and comprehension of spoken Russian
Reading and writing in Russian at various levels
Application of digital tools for language learning
Understanding of Russian literature and culture
InterpersonalAndCommunicationSkills: Effective communication in Russian for basic conversations
Building confidence in verbal and written exchanges
Collaborating in group language-learning activities
Facilitating discussions on cultural topics in Russian
Engaging in immersive conversational practices
ProblemSolvingAndAnalyticalSkills: Applying problem-solving techniques in language acquisition
Analyzing sentence structures and grammatical rules
Developing strategies to improve language proficiency
Interpreting Russian texts for meaning and context
Synthesizing cultural and linguistic patterns
OrganizationalAndLeadershipSkills: Organizing personal study schedules for language mastery
Leading small group exercises in Russian classes
Planning and participating in cultural immersion projects
Managing time effectively in coursework and assignments
Encouraging peer collaboration in language-learning tasks
